title: Westmount Island: The Complete Trilogy
description: Welcome to Westmount Island. Where the ferry boat is the perfect setting for falling in love.Included in this boxset are all three Westmount Island Novellas. Follow all three Michaels sisters on their short and steamy journeys to love.Falling Fast: Sparks fly in an instant when millionaire Marcus finds Ella on the ferry boat to Westmount Island. Heâ€™s here for work, not love, but can it be denied?Falling Again: Widowed father Sam and his son are looking for a fresh start on the island. When Toby befriends Kayla, will he help his father find happiness again?Falling Forever: Tawny and Mac were secret high-school sweethearts. When a misunderstanding drives them apart, both of their hearts are broken. Can they find their way to a second chance at true love?
author: Julia Jarrett
